name: Little Duty 1
description:
Little Duty is a Multiplayer Game , with simple game mode for now team death match and ffa death match , it is curently simple, because i wanted to try to make it like that , you don 't need to buy guns to make experience for unlocking guns , just lets get some fun each other that's all .

It is a game that i made for learning unreal 4 , and i decided to put on steam the result . because why not ;) !!!

ps: I will let the game playable for free untill i decide to put an other !
